items.name: Terrarium
items.blurb: Part of my sketch a day challenge. I really like how this one came out.

items.name: UFO
items.blurb: Part of the sketch daily challenge series. I was really happy with the idea and the execution wasn't bad either.

items.name: Bridges on Mute
items.blurb: This is a self published joke that is targetted for a spicific group of people and it's pages are mostly blank.

items.name: Brief Case (sketch)
items.blurb: One of the sketch daily prompts was Briefcase. I went for the obvious pun and made an image showing a brief case. A little animation in there for fun!

items.name: Brief Cases
items.blurb: A friend and I were talking about collective nouns for animals... So I took the Brief Case (sketch) and enhanced it with puns! A Lawyer Business of ferrets, a parliment of Owl judges, etc. Since I was already thinking about my ferrets.biz site I was determined to bring it to there. So then I started thinking what would this animal world look like. I branched out past Judge Hooty and the Kangaroo Court. I imagined there was a person washed up on an island full of animals who had evolved. I was crankig out images for it and it seemed like it had steam.

items.name: Beach Hyena
items.blurb: In the Brief Cases 'universe' this little guy loves going to the beach. I figured Hyenas laugh, so they have to like a good time.

items.name: Lamp Post
items.blurb: A lamp post inspired by a lamp post outside my house. It took on its own life afterwards. It reminds me a bit of the lamp post at the End of Time in Chrono Trigger.

items.name: Island
items.blurb: An experiment I did with a limited color palette. Reminds me of a Game Boy (original) game.

items.name: Earthrise
items.blurb: I used the picture Earthrise as a reference for this and primarily used a tool that lighten and darkens pixels since it was the perfect scene for that opeeration.

items.name: CyberDuck
items.blurb: I was talking to a colleague about an FTP tool called CyberDuck and it sparked this image. I liked playing with the dark background and light from the screen.

items.name: Cockroach
items.blurb: A part of the sketch daily set. The first one I did and the gateway back to doing pixel art.

items.name: Judge Hooty
items.blurb: Since a group of owls are a parliment and that gives visions of people in white powdered wigs and then judges. Of course the judge's name had to be Judge Hooty.

items.name: Magpie
items.blurb: One of the anthropomorphized animals I planned on using for Brief Cases.

items.name: Moth
items.blurb: Another insect that I think was for sketch daily.

items.name: Mr Farington
items.blurb: A ferret for Brief Cases. He was going to be a defendent for a case.

items.name: Robot
items.blurb: Robot! I started with the treads not really knowing what I wanted to draw. Made my way up.

items.name: Skunk
items.blurb: An anthropomorphized skunk who was going to be a plantiff.

items.name: Tiger
items.blurb: My daughter likes tigers. So... Tiger.
